name: Automatized Maintenance System DEPRECATED
desc: Utilization of various maintenance drone and automated logistic system overhaul. Reduces maintenance costs by %s

name: Partial Automation Overhaul DEPRECATED
desc: Partial automation overhaul of ship system using remote controlled droneship software. Reduces minimum crew costs by %s while still allow human passenger to live on the ship and be captained by human captain.

name: Railfeed Fighter
desc: This fighter pilot has to put up with being jammed in a long dark tunnel inside a ship, leading to an autoloading gantry, inside a fighter that they will likely have to escape from when it inevitably fails in heavy fire. Reduces max CR to %s.

name: Exploration Refit
desc: A series of tweaks and upgrades designed maximize ship logistical efficiency. Decreases the monthly maintenance supply cost by %s.

name: Damper Vent
desc: A modified venting system that trigger a damper field during venting at cost of disabling weapon system for 5 second after venting

name: Droneship Automation Overhaul
desc: Partial automation overhaul of ship system using remote controlled droneship software. Reduces minimum crew costs by %s while still allow human passenger to live on the ship and be captained by human captain. Require other ship equpped with %s hullmod to function both in combat and outside of it. Failure to do so will Reduce ship combat readiness by %s outside combat and Increased CR Degradation by %s during combat also disable weapon system and ship engine. (Becareful dont let your ship with Drone Command Center to die during battle).

name: Droneship Operation Center
desc: An added Command Module necessary for enslaved remote droneship to operate. Also increase ECCM rating by  %s .

name: Nomad Logistical Overhaul
desc: When no other ship beside this ship, increase Maximum Fuel Tank by %s .

name: Vagabond Logistic Doctrine
desc: When no other ship beside this ship or 2 other, increase Maximum Fuel Tank by flat %s , Monthly supplies maintanance by %s , and Burn Drive by %s .

name: Thirteen Battlegroup
desc: This ship is a survivor of the original 13th Domain Battlegroup which infamous for their inquisitorial zealotry in pacifying remnant of old Domain Advesary. It is a prime specimen of the Domain Navy's "attrition battle" doctrine, particularly exhibited by a series of radical structural modifications (performed with pre-Collapse industrial methods) which allow the mounting of heavier armor plating by a flat increase of %s standard units, with only a %s maneuverability and flat -5 decrease of movement speed, Ship with this hullmod also come with built-in Damper Vent to protects its hull. Exceptionally well-tuned energy systems increase flux throughput and capacity by %s over standard examples of this hull.

name: Converted Hangar - Frigate
desc:
Convert some of Carrier vast hangar into makeshift Frigates Hangar, give necessary tools and utility to maintain and store designated frigates. Require Capital with Hangar.

Provide %s storage capacity for frigates.
short: Gives slots to store designated Frigates.

name: Stored Frigate
desc: Mark this vessel to be stored on Hangar, reducing both its montly supply and fuel cost down to 0, as long as there is slots in converted carrier hangar
short: Mark this vessel to be stored on Hangar, reduce its supply and fuel down 0.

name: Converted Hangar - Frigate (Cruiser)
desc:
Convert some of Carrier vast hangar into makeshift Frigates Hangar, give necessary tools and utility to maintain and store designated frigates. Require Cruiser with 2 or more Hangar and a Salvage Rigs.

Provide %s storage capacity for frigates.
short: Gives slots to store designated Frigates.

name: Second Grade Deck
desc: This ship's fighter bay using second grade after-market bay. The second grade manufactory that produces fighter chassis is old and unreliable, and most components have minor defects. Fighter speed reduced by %s, and damage taken increased by %s.
short: A second grade fighter bay. Fighter speed reduced by %s, and damage taken increased by %s.

name: Makeshift Fighter Bay
desc: This ship's cargo hold has been converted to house a single makeshift of fighter bays. The improvised manufactory that produces fighter chassis is unreliable, and most components have minor defects. Fighter speed reduced by %s, and damage taken increased by %s.

name: Fleet Gantry
desc:
Dedicated onboard gantry and fleet servicing facility able to provide wide range of logistical bonus for ship member of the fleets.

Provide %s supply use per month reduction bonus and %s recovery and DP reduction bonus to all ships member of the fleets. 

Its vast bulk and hangar also feature necessary tools and gantry to maintain and store up to %s frigates to be stored inside.

its dedicated fleetwide drive field stabilizer device also give flat %s to all ships within the ships.
short: Provide supply use, DP, after combat supplies recovery and max burn bonust to all ships within the fleets

name: Wanderer Logistic Overhaul
desc: When no other ship beside this ship or 5 other, increase Maximum Fuel Tank by flat %s , Monthly supplies maintanance by %s , and Burn Drive by %s .
